lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The company will use both an annual security-to-debt ratio test and a monthly cash flow test to classify which interest payments are paid on the different portions of debt.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Outlining terms of the plan circulated to the lenders earlier this week, the company said it is seeking approval in principle for the proposal "within the next several weeks" in order to implement the debt rescheduling by June 30, 1987.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Terms of the debt plan include paying institutional unsecured creditors, comprising mostly banks who hold private debt, from cash flow generated by unpledged assets.

lst.name: sentence
